title: After the Mongols sacked Baghdad, who build it again? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mamelukes after defeating the Mongols at the battle of Al Jalut(1260) took back Baghdad ad rebuilded it.But the damage was done and the burnt ancient scrolls were never recovered again.Actually city was never fully destroyed,Mongols sacked and burned the city after they have conquered it.Baghdad was one of the richest cities of the medieval world as its yearly budget surpassed the whole kingdom of France.Being the capital of the Abbasid Caliphate, it was vital for the islamic culture.Mongols invaded Baghdad and sacked the city in 1258 destroying the famous library and shutting down the observatoriesand ending the golden age of Islam.However when Hulagu left the area after his brother Ogedai's death in Mongolia in 1260,Baibars of Mamelukes attacked and reclaimed the city
